user.title: Select your street
user.description: Choose the street for which you want to monitor the trash pickup schedule.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the ProNatura service.
error.street_not_found: The selected street is no longer available. Please choose again.
error.no_streets: No streets are available right now.
error.address_not_found: The selected address is no longer available. Please choose again.
error.no_addresses: No address points are available for this street.

abort.street_not_found: The selected street can no longer be configured.

address_not_found.title: Update your ProNatura address
address_not_found.description: Home Assistant can no longer find the configured address {address}. Most probably its name changed in ProNatura database. To fix this issue, reconfigure the integration and pick the address once again.
